revision.text:
<!--군대_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = MilitaryUnit
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 부대 명칭 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 창설일 | ontologyProperty = activeYearsStartDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 해체 | ontologyProperty = activeYearsEndDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국가 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 병과 | ontologyProperty = militaryBranch }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종류 | ontologyProperty = type }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 역할 | ontologyProperty = role }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 규모 | ontologyProperty = militaryUnitSize }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 명령 체계 | ontologyProperty = commandStructure }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 본부 | ontologyProperty =garrison }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 별명 | ontologyProperty =foaf:nick }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 표어 | ontologyProperty = motto }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 색 | ontologyProperty = colourName }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 군가 | ontologyProperty =march }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 마스코트 | ontologyProperty = mascot }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 기념일 | ontologyProperty = anniversary }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 참전 | ontologyProperty =battle }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지휘관 | ontologyProperty =commander }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 명지휘관 | ontologyProperty =notableCommander }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 문장 | ontologyProperty = identificationSymbol }}

end}}
